message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CL 

The paper deals with image analysis and machine learning techniques for writer identification based on single-word images. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a deep adaptive learning method using multi-task learning, which involves training a neural network to perform multiple tasks simultaneously. This suggests that the paper could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) or cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper involves text analysis and recognition, which could place it in the sub-categories of cs.IR (Information Retrieval) or cs.CL (Computation and Language).
